segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching for the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unsteady that stool looks—it’s about to tip!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and his sister is just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall—he could really hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is making the floor slippery, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, but she’s not even helping him stay balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will even notice if one of them falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
